textBeforeTable: Larry Rose’s 2012 Top Ten Albums The xx in the KEXP studios, 07/25/2012 photo credit: Dave Lichterman (more photos) For the rest of the year, we’ll be spotlighting our KEXP DJs Top Albums of 2012, leading up to our 2012 Top Album Countdown, as voted on by our listeners! Voting ends on Friday, December 21st, so let us know your favorites now, and tune in on Friday, December 28th to hear if your picks made the list! textAfterTable: Larry Rose is the host of Larry’s Lounge, on the air Tuesday nights from 9PM-1AM.
